mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_friend (user_id, friend_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{friendId}, NOW()), (#{friendId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM user_friend uf JOIN user u ON uf.friend_id = u.id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_friend WHERE (user_id = #{userId} AND friend_id = #{friendId}) OR (user_id = #{friendId} AND friend_id = #{userId})
